page.shortlink: api client api a5 listbox resize method

discussion.p: The resize method should be used in preference to the refresh method when changes to the list are made that only effect the layout size of the list. When the refresh method is called the entire list is redrawn. In contrast the resize method only changes the sizes of elements in the list. If the contents or display of an element in the list header or footer is changed or a column size is adjusted, the resize method can fix layout issues without causing a refresh of the entire list.
